biases.description: They're having their water poisoned by defective material
biases.text:
They have learnt that the gas and general wastes of these machines is getting into the crops they grow, water they drink and clothes they wear.
    This has lead to the populations of other countries criticising them for their poor management of their agricultural machine and innefective use of resources.
    It is true that the machines are second hand and Xayan originally however, the new owners seem to be incapable of correctly utilising the value

biases.headline: The people of Zuania are using technology kindly donated to them by Xaya, still complain
biases.text: Zuanians have been using defective machines to produce their agricultural goods. Their inneptitude with new technologies has lead to a steady decline in the health of their lands. Despite this clearly being an issue theiur could attempt to solve themselves, it seems they are keen on blaming it on Xayan people, who kindly donated these technologies to them.

biases.headline: Xaya is intentionally selling archaic technology to Zuanian farmers
biases.text:
The people of Zuania have been trying to make their land better for a number of years now. With that has come a massive amount of agricultural changes and improvements and despite their conflict with Xaya and its attempted takeover of Zuanian lands, they've purchased tractors and other machines from them.
    Xayan people and their government seem to have purposefully sold them archaic and toxic technologies. They now insist on critique towards the people of Zuania for 'destroying the environemnt'
